div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1548 Syria, northern, 1912 (1033) Burial: c. 160 B.C. Contents: AR Alexander III: post. tetradr. (Miletus) Lysimachus: tetradr. Miletus: 1 tetradr. Antiochus IV: tetradr. Antiochus V: tetradr. Disposition: dispersed Regling, ZfN 1928, p. 94
